meta.review_content: I phoned Vodacom on Wednesday night to block a line and get an ITC Number. I was promised it would take maximum 24 hours. I still haven't received it, and it's impossible to phone Vodacom from a non-Vodacom sim card, you get a bot and no one to speak to
